# When to use Azure Active Directory (AD) Business to Business (B2B)?
Azure AD B2B enables you to securely collaborate with external parties.

![Azure Active Directory Business to Business.](../images/when-to-use-azure-active-directory-business-to-business.png)

- Integrate with identity providers.
- use conditional access policies to intelligently grant or deny access.
- Require Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for guest users.
